Description: Live in a condo building with a pool, laundry on-site, and parking available in the back parking lot. Heat and hot water are included in the rent. Central air conditioning. All you have to do is move in. This modern building sits on the 1400 block of Commonwealth Avenue with easy access to nightlife, restaurants, live music, public transit, and universities. Features at a glance: new hardwood floors, updated kitchen, new windows, large bedroom closets, laundry on-site, private pool, directly on the Green Line. No pets. No smoking.
